Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
  Simulation

public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object

A simulation consists for now of a list of users and a list of documents. "Running" the simulation consists of iterating through the users and asking them to "act". The simulation also provides a search method to the users so they can retrieve the top documents.

Version:
assign1
Author:
babak

Constructor Summary
Simulation()
          Initialize the simulation with empty lists of users and documents
 
Method Summary
 void addDocument(Document d)
          add the supplied document to the list of documents
 void addUser(User u)
          add the supplied user to the list of users
 void run()
          A simulation run consists of: 1- pick a user (for now just pick them in order from the list) 2- get the user to act
 java.util.ArrayList<Document> search()
          return top documents according to some strategy.
